name: Bostco Cartastrophe
description:
Bostco Boy always aspired to succeed Gawd’s job as CART MANAGER, but at the end of his unpaid internship (for P.E. credit) -- CARTASTROPHE STRUCK!

Sound Design : Daniel Ramos == Composition: Kei Matsuo == Engineers: Ken Miller, Alex Pinedo, Kristi Chang == Art: Chi Ngo, Tara Nguyen, Pat Dmaandal == Design: Peter Doria
